Requirements You are in @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Mountain Stance]

You stomp, shaking the earth beneath you. Creatures on the ground within a @Template[type:emanation|distance:20] take damage equal to your Strength modifier (minimum 0), which they can resist with a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:resolve(@actor.system.attributes.classDC.value)|basic:true] save against your class DC. On a failure, they also fall @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Prone].

After you use this action, you can't use it again for [[/r 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4 rounds}.

Special If you have this feat, the Dexterity modifier cap to your AC while using Mountain Stance increases from +1 to +2.
